sub_title: Senior Clinical Scientist at Philips and Honorary Senior lecturer at Bangor University
summary:
I am a Clinical Scientist and Product Owner of an Agile Team working on Hospital Patient Monitoring solutions focusing on hemodynamic management of critically ill patients. 

I am responsible for the advanced development and the clinical validation of the investigational device.  I am very familiar with ICH Good Clinical Practice and relevant ISO standards.

Next to my Clinical Scientist and Product Owner job I keep my academic interest alive. I coordinate an Eindhoven MedTech Innovation Center project for which I supervise 3 PhD students. I have an honorary position at Bangor University in the UK.  My academic interest is in physiological and behavioral data analytics, using mainstream (RStudio® and Python) analytical languages.

My PhD focused on human skeletal muscle metabolism in relation to sugar availability, during which I have mastered several wet lab techniques and primary human cell cultures.
